messages.subject: Hello, I'm new and want to know how...
messages.msgSnippet: to get started with this unschooling.  I have four dc and have been homeschooling for five years now.  I m tired of having school at home and want to allow
messages.messageBody:
to get started with this unschooling. I have four dc and have
been "homeschooling" for five years now. I'm tired of having "school
at home" and want to allow my dc to enjoy being just that...children.
Their ages by the way are 9, 8, 6, and 19 mos. I suppose I shouldn't
even have said "get started", eh? lol Also, as I've been discussing
this approach with my dh, he's showing some resistance to allowing our
dc to just "be." Any tips on encouraging him to relax...A LOT?

Thanks!

Lisa
